properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')BOARD_DT FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_CD = 3
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')BOARD_DT FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_CD = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_CD DESC
SELECT EVENT_NO,EVENT_TITLE,EVENT_IMG FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_ST = 'N' ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC
SELECT EVENT_NO,EVENT_TITLE,EVENT_IMG FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO =? AND BOARD_CD = 3)

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_NM,MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL,MEMBER_ADD,SECESSION_FL FROM MEMBER
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC)A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_CD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_PW,MEMBER_NM,MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL,MEMBER_ADD,SECESSION_FL FROM MEMBER
WHERE SECESSION_FL ='N'
